name: Site Report For Billing
query:
SELECT
    (@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS "Index:Int:60",
    s.name AS "Site ID:Link/Site:150",
    s.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:150",
    s.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",  
    s.customer_type AS "Customer Type:Data:100",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:100",
    s.stage AS "Stage:Data:100",
    s.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:100",
    s.solution_name AS "Solution:Data:150",
    s.pincode AS "Pincode:Data:80",
    s.city AS "City:Data:120",
    s.state AS "State:Data:120",
    s.date AS "Circuit Delivery Date:Date:120",
    s.project AS "Project:Link/Project:150",
    s.sales_order AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:150",
    s.billing_status AS "Billing Status:Data:100",
    s.partially_completed_date AS "Partially Completed Date:Date:120",
    s.customer_po_no AS "Customer PO No:Data:120",
    s.customer_po_date AS "Customer PO Date:Date:120",

    lv.lms_id AS "LMS ID:Data:120",
    lv.lms_supplier AS "LMS Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
    lv.bandwith_type AS "Bandwidth Type:Data:100",
    i.item_name AS "Bandwidth:Data:150",
    lv.stage AS "LMS Stage:Data:100",
    lv.lms_delivery_date AS "LMS Delivery Date:Date:120"

FROM `tabSite` s
LEFT JOIN `tabLMS Site` lv 
    ON lv.parent = s.name AND lv.parenttype = 'Site'
LEFT JOIN `tabItem` i 
    ON i.name = lv.bandwidth,
(SELECT @rownum := 0) r

WHERE lv.stage = 'LMS Delivered'
  AND s.site_status != 'Cancelled'

ORDER BY s.date DESC;
